title: Dear Cumbrian Food Lover
content: Close your eyes. Imagine the sizzle of garlic in a wok, the fragrant steam of jasmine rice, the crisp snap of tempura batter between your teeth. Now open them-*welcome to ARYA*, where these moments come alive in the heart of Carlisle.

title: A Night Out That Feels Like a Getaway
content: The glow of paper lanterns. The clink of sake cups. The murmur of 'ohmygod try this' from nearby tables. However your perfect night looks, we've set the stage: Date Night? title: Chefs who can cook with passion (and a little magic)
